original_title: Rouge - A Festa dos Seus Sonhos
overview: "A Festa dos Seus Sonhos" is a video live album by Brazilian pop group 'Rouge', recorded from a special show at the Pacaembú Stadium (São Paulo) on September 21, 2003, commemorating the group's first year of existence and brought together about 30,000 people.
title: A Festa dos Seus Sonhos
